title: While Healing It

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Heal (Night): Choose a player. You will grant them Invincible defense for the night and remove any negative effects from them.
- Guard (Night): Choose a player. You will grant them Basic defense and deal a Powerful attack to all of their attackers for the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your visits are Astral.
- You may not target the same player more than once. If you were converted from To Wander, the list of players you have previously targeted is wiped. Additionally, if you targeted a player who is converted to the Unseen after you have converted them, you may target them again.

desc:
Post 2038
*Trick my mind into thinking the pain is actually addictive*
